title: An explanation on ELO/MMR? Oh and also talking about my first Ranked Games ^^

replies.body: Please dont play ranked if you just hit 30.

Please don't leave comments that have nothing to do with what I asked. :) 
PS: I do whatever the hell I want xD
considering you're initial rank was silver 1, you must be better than at least half of everyone else who just hit level 30. i think at that point you're allowed to do what ever the hell you want :)

Hey there,

MMR and Elo are pretty much the same thing, which is a system used to calculate a player's skill level. The match making system looks at all your wins and losses and the converts this into a number - the system then matches you with other players with a similar number.

That's a pretty basic explanation - you can find out more here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide

But seriously - you just turned level 30 and you're gold already? I should be asking you the questions. Just keep doing what you're doing!
Ah! Thank you! I'll take a look right away! See ya around ^^
so, who hooked you up with the happy go lucky gogo juice? most people who get gold and silver right after becoming level 30 usually become snobs and make life hell for others.
Are you saying most people are bad? I tend to see my glass half full. I shall not become a snog and make life hell for others coz I'm not like that.
less bad, more stuck up pricks.

MMR and Elo are what the system used to determine your skill . A fresh account that just hit lv 30 will have 1.2k MMR which is an indication for Silver V ( MMR might varies depend on sever) ; every win in ranked in a provisional match would get you 40-80 MMR/ELO, MMR/ELO does not show ingame but can be guessed through various site eg. op.gg .

Most people say "you shouldn't play ranked as soon as you hit lv 30" are people who reckon you are not ready, as someone who don't know you I would recommend the same , but it's my opinion and you don't have to listen to it. It's better to play normal imo for a little while since you can hone your skill that way which prepare you for rank, you said you achieved Silver I after ranked which would mean you either went 6/4 or 7/3 in placements

I think what Vicelore trying to say is if you practice or have enough game sense, you could have reach higher then Silver I as a placements , i'm not belittling you but I think he was referencing from all of the above.

Note : How did you play 107 ranked games w/ 50% win rate if you only got to lv 30?

Aaah I see what you mean now. But you know, I'm only playing ranked because it's not going to be official and I'm having a lot of fun playing "like it's competition". I told my friends I would not play ranked games for next season because I want to earn all the champions first. Then, I'll eventually start playing ranked for real competition. Pre season is cool like that.
And I usually win with Miss Fortune and Malphite in ranked, and I'm quite good with the both of them. Their teamfight is insane ^^
